episodes.title: Living Among The 12 Tribes Cult: What She Saw
episodes.description: In this eye-opening episode of From One to Wicked, we sit down with Nicole, who spent several months living among the controversial 12 Tribes cult. Nicole shares a detailed, first-person account of what it was really like behind closed doors — from the intense love-bombing she experienced upon arrival to the disturbing ways children were treated within the group. She opens up about the psychological tactics used to control members, the hidden rules that governed daily life, and the difficult moments that ultimately led her to leave. Whether you've heard of the 12 Tribes before or not, Nicole’s story offers a rare, honest glimpse into a world few outsiders ever get to see.

episodes.title: NXIVM Cult | The Sex Cult That's Still Active Today
episodes.description: In this episode of From One To Wicked, Madison and JT unravel the shocking rise and fall of NXIVM, the notorious "self-help" organization that unraveled into a web of manipulation, branding rituals, and sex trafficking. From its beginnings as a pyramid scheme to the disturbing practices of DOS, we dissect the cult’s charismatic leader Keith Raniere, his bizarre claims of genius, and the women who helped enforce his sinister vision. Dive deep into the allegations, the high-profile members involved, and the criminal convictions that rocked the world. Join us as we rate this chilling true crime story on our wickedness scale. Don't forget to subscribe and share your thoughts in the comments!

episodes.title: The Twelve Tribes Cult | The Dangerous Cult In Your Neighborhood
episodes.description: Become a Parajunkie Today! www.patreon.com/savannahunderground Welcome to From One To Wicked, the podcast where true crime meets chilling analysis. Hosted by Madison K. Drayton and JT, we take an in-depth look at the darkest corners of humanity, investigating criminals and cults before placing them on our custom wickedness scale. Each episode is a deep dive into motive, brutality, and more, scored live by our devoted fanbase, the Parajunkies, via interactive YouTube polls. No crime is too taboo, and no perpetrator escapes judgment in our pursuit of dissecting wickedness. In today’s episode, we unravel the twisted history of the Twelve Tribes cult, a sinister Christian fundamentalist group cloaked in hippie charm and communal living. Beneath their seemingly idyllic façade lies a disturbing doctrine that justifies racism, homophobia, and extreme child abuse. Led by founder Gene Spriggs, the Twelve Tribes controlled every aspect of their members’ lives while spreading their oppressive beliefs across continents. We examine the horrifying tales of ex-members, accounts of systemic abuse, and the lasting scars left by one of the most troubling cults in modern history. Buckle up as we rate the Twelve Tribes from One to Wicked — spoiler alert, they’re pretty wicked.
